title: Sensetive03
author: Sensetive03
content: İ WONDER . if, please share pic friends .   yas.bet looking like scam ..

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Wait until you get a reply on their ann thread since you already posted their. You don't need to make a thread just to ask this asking on their ann is the same thing asking here. Yas.bet is a new casino trying to build their reputation, they have signature campaign too, so scamming is not a thing for them, well, at least for now.

comments.author: Sensetive03
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on August 10, 2022, 11:39:24 AMWait until you get a reply on their ann thread since you already posted their. You don't need to make a thread just to ask this asking on their ann is the same thing asking here. Yas.bet is a new casino trying to build their reputation, they have signature campaign too, so scamming is not a thing for them, well, at least for now.you are reply every post and everytime..  are you worker of yasbet ??   scamming smells ...

comments.author: RikandMorty1
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on August 10, 2022, 11:39:24 AMYas.bet is a new casino trying to build their reputation, they have signature campaign too, so scamming is not a thing for them, well, at least for now.So having a signature campaign automatically means the said serivce is legit ? One would almost think that a senior member should know better.Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 11:26:33 AMİ WONDER . if, please share pic friends .   yas.bet looking like scam ..Can you provide any information whatsoever about your case ? For example, the amount scammed,how did it happen, etc. Or else, what is the point of this thread if no one can verify your claims?

comments.author: mak013
comments.body: Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 11:26:33 AMİ WONDER . if, please share pic friends .   yas.bet looking like scam ..I don`t understand your question. Do you have some problems with the casino or just interesting? I see that you asked the same question in their thread and got an advice to ask the support. In that thread i don`t see the posts with the problems and the manager answers rather fast. I can`t say anything good or bad about this casino - they are too young.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 12:15:40 PMyou are reply every post and everytime..  are you worker of yasbet ??   scamming smells ...Sometimes you need to explore things before saying and accusing something, accusing someone without knowing thing makes you dumb, and its not good for your everyday life.I'm giving you advice for good yet you come barking and accused me.PS. I'm not working to Yas.bet nor to anyone. Quote from: RikandMorty1 on August 10, 2022, 12:38:18 PMQuote from: PX-Z on August 10, 2022, 11:39:24 AMYas.bet is a new casino trying to build their reputation, they have signature campaign too, so scamming is not a thing for them, well, at least for now.So having a signature campaign automatically means the said serivce is legit ? One would almost think that a senior member should know better.Please comprehend, i don't need to explain, read my statement again.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 11:26:33 AMİ WONDER . if, please share pic friends .   yas.bet looking like scam ..I see you as a troller, considering your quantity of post and how many times into it you've written word "scam".Yas.bet at the moment is trying to build his reputation, some user (like Slow Death) has already withdrawn from this casino without any issue. So, use their ANN thread or contact support directly to solve your issue.Also, you haven't written how much you have to withdraw, and what you've played, so, before to call to a "scam" you should prove that.EDIT: considering your post history, everything is a scam for you; you've already accused other well reputable casino like Trustdice.win and Duelbits.com

comments.author: Sensetive03
comments.body: sorry , you have yasbet advertisement on you.   I told yasbet that I wanted to change my currency. they said open a new account. but no sportsbook and casino accepts this . It is inconvenient to open more than one account on the same ip. I asked for the answer and they did not answer.

comments.author: YASBET
comments.body: Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 01:05:35 PMsorry , you have yasbet advertisement on you.   I told yasbet that I wanted to change my currency. they said open a new account. but no sportsbook and casino accepts this . It is inconvenient to open more than one account on the same ip. I asked for the answer and they did not answer. Hello we can see your request in our live chat support also the team answered that you are not able to change any player currency! but if you need to open your account in any other currency you need to open an account in what currency you need when you are registering your account. Thank you for your corporation Best Regards

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: YASBET on August 10, 2022, 01:15:48 PMQuote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 01:05:35 PMsorry , you have yasbet advertisement on you.   I told yasbet that I wanted to change my currency. they said open a new account. but no sportsbook and casino accepts this . It is inconvenient to open more than one account on the same ip. I asked for the answer and they did not answer. Hello we can see your request in our live chat support also the team answered that you are not able to change any player currency! but if you need to open your account in any other currency you need to open an account in what currency you need when you are registering your account. Thank you for your corporation Best Regards Based on this answer you're either lying or you totally missed the answer, you are too impatient to get an answer that you have to open a topic about your small issue when this can be addressed properly in their own thread or waiting for the support to answer you, at least you can give them enough time to address your issue.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: YASBET on August 10, 2022, 01:15:48 PMQuote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 01:05:35 PMsorry , you have yasbet advertisement on you.   I told yasbet that I wanted to change my currency. they said open a new account. but no sportsbook and casino accepts this . It is inconvenient to open more than one account on the same ip. I asked for the answer and they did not answer. Hello we can see your request in our live chat support also the team answered that you are not able to change any player currency! but if you need to open your account in any other currency you need to open an account in what currency you need when you are registering your account. Thank you for your corporation Best Regards @Sensetive03 what that means is that it is not possible to change your player currency when you are already a registered member, You can only change/select your player currency when registering an account, this does not in any way suggest or support multi-accounting as registering multiple accounts is against the terms and conditions of the casino, I hope this comment gives you more clarity.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 11:26:33 AMİ WONDER . if, please share pic friends.At a glance the @YASBET gambling site team has answered your question, of course that's a quick response from the YASBET team.Because I have never tried to register and bet on the YASBET gambling site, so I can't show you proof of withdrawal, but there is a review topic about YASBET that you can see here: YAS.BET Review Campaign | Get Paid for Leave a Review ! |, Of course all the issues of positive and negative reviews are there, including withdrawals and photos, maybe you want to review it for a moment.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Christ! OP couldn't wait a minute for the YAS reply but had to create a noise. The casino is building thier reputation which they wouldn't be ruining while running a marketing campaign. I'd be more understanding if the casino suddenly has downtime after trying to withdraw. Quote from: Wiwo on August 10, 2022, 01:26:03 PMQuote from: YASBET on August 10, 2022, 01:15:48 PMQuote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 01:05:35 PMsorry , you have yasbet advertisement on you.   I told yasbet that I wanted to change my currency. they said open a new account. but no sportsbook and casino accepts this . It is inconvenient to open more than one account on the same ip. I asked for the answer and they did not answer. Hello we can see your request in our live chat support also the team answered that you are not able to change any player currency! but if you need to open your account in any other currency you need to open an account in what currency you need when you are registering your account. Thank you for your corporation Best Regards @Sensetive03 what that means is that it is not possible to change your player currency when you are already a registered member, You can only change/select your player currency when registering an account, this does not in any way suggest or support multi-accounting as registering multiple accounts is against the terms and conditions of the casino, I hope this comment gives you more clarity.Not very convenient way to make users create another account just for this purpose. They need to hire an experienced programmer for this.

comments.author: YASBET
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on August 10, 2022, 01:21:36 PMQuote from: YASBET on August 10, 2022, 01:15:48 PMQuote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 01:05:35 PMsorry , you have yasbet advertisement on you.   I told yasbet that I wanted to change my currency. they said open a new account. but no sportsbook and casino accepts this . It is inconvenient to open more than one account on the same ip. I asked for the answer and they did not answer. Hello we can see your request in our live chat support also the team answered that you are not able to change any player currency! but if you need to open your account in any other currency you need to open an account in what currency you need when you are registering your account. Thank you for your corporation Best Regards Based on this answer you're either lying or you totally missed the answer, you are too impatient to get an answer that you have to open a topic about your small issue when this can be addressed properly in their own thread or waiting for the support to answer you, at least you can give them enough time to address your issue.Hellothe live support team also explain to player in our website what  about lie ? please explain us when you want to register you chose tour country , currency , language and etc..

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 11:26:33 AMİ WONDER . if, please share pic friends .   yas.bet looking like scam ..On what grounds you come up with this accusation although there’s nothing wrong to question new casino but having a history of successful withdrawal will not make the casino legit because scam casino do allow withdrawal and just scam players later on. No one will listen to your accusation unless you provide proof or a clear sign that they are really gonna scam.They have campaigns and paid participants promptly so it’s very hard to believe on your accusation unless they already do it or show some sign of being a scam.

comments.author: RikandMorty1
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on August 10, 2022, 12:40:31 PM. Quote from: RikandMorty1 on August 10, 2022, 12:38:18 PMSo having a signature campaign automatically means the said serivce is legit ? One would almost think that a senior member should know better.Please comprehend, i don't need to explain, read my statement again.You literraly said and i quote: Quotethey have signature campaign too, so scamming is not a thing for themHow can i possibly have missunderstood that.

comments.author: rokuen
comments.body: https://ibb.co/PN7Z5Dw can't vouch for them but my withdrawals were processed quickly

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.created_time: August 10, 2022, 01:53:14 PMLast edit: August 10, 2022, 02:28:15 PM by lionheart78
comments.body: Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 11:26:33 AMİ WONDER . if, please share pic friends .   yas.bet looking like scam ..You can always avoid playing in a Casino where you are not comfortable but I think creating a thread and saying that a casino is a scam is outrageous.  You can always ask in a mild manner since you have no proof that Yas.bet is scamming anyone.  Besides, the representative of the Casino had already told us on their announcement thread that we need to open a new account if want to change our currency.  I think by that, multi-accounting is allowed in Yas.bet.  Multi-accounting isn't allowed on their terms and condition.  Since Yas.bet has the right to block all extra account leaving only one account to access the site.Quote from: bittraffic on August 10, 2022, 01:43:25 PMNot very convenient way to make users create another account just for this purpose. They need to hire an experienced programmer for this.I agree, but I think the site is not configured for currency change atm so openning new account is the workaround.Quote from: rokuen on August 10, 2022, 01:52:32 PMcan't vouch for them but my withdrawals were processed quicklyThat wasn't quickly though.  I think it takes hours if I am not mistaken.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Op going with the responses so far and that from the team, I think you need to open an account to the currency you wish maybe there is already a restriction to switch when you have already registered. So do you have a winning that you want to withdraw from another currency or what are you asking for?

comments.author: Franctoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 10, 2022, 11:26:33 AMİ WONDER . if, please share pic friends .    yas.bet looking like scam ..I'm wondering how you just came up with such accusation on a site that is just trying to build their reputation without stating categorically what issues you've had with them and equally evidence of what your are trying to say, how do you expect us to properly decod your issues with yas.bet and for people to attend to your question. Quote from: Gianluca95 on August 10, 2022, 01:00:18 PMconsidering your post history, everything is a scam for you; you've already accused other well reputable casino like Trustdice.win and Duelbits.comI equally saw same thing from his post history , this kind of person are trolls and are good to put on the ignore list.I guess he's trying to know if they are Scam platform or not and that's not the best way to go about it.
